name: Don't Forget (Darhen)
description:
You’re victim of the disease and have to complete simple task of every day life.
Problem is, you don’t remember what you have to do!
To help, you’ve written down messages on Post-it all around your flat. They gives you hints to search inside your diary.
The diary is a physical element (real) and the key to resolve the game.
To be able to hit the « Play » button you must enter 190184 in the padlock in the game menu.

You must use The diary in PDF  format or printed algonside the game to resolve the puzzles.
